Translations.Text: Bwekityo abo ababakulembera tewali mubaka yabajjira okugyako nga bagamba nti mulogo oba mulalu
Abaffe bakyeramira (nedda ssi bwekiri) wabula bo bantu be wagguzi
Kale baveeko toli ggwe anenyezebwa
Wabula bulirira anti mazima okubulirira kugasa abakkiriza
Era ssaatonda amajinni n’abantu wabula lwakuba nti bansinze
Sibaagalamu Riziki era ssaagala bandiise
Mazima Katonda yye yaagaba Riziki nannyini maanyi omusobozi
Mazima abo abeeyisa obubi balina ebyonoono nga ebyonoono bya bannaabwe n’olwekyo tebampapya (kubatuusaako bibonerezo mu bwangu)
Okubonabona kuli eri abo abawakanya olunaku lwabwe olwo lwe baalaganyisibwa (olunaku lw’enkomerero)
Ndayidde olusozi (Sinaa)
Ndayidde ekitabo ekiwandiike
Mu mpapula ennyanjuluze
Era ndayidde e nyumba etaggwako basinza (ba Malayika bagyetoloola olubeerera)
Era ndayidde akasolya (k'eggulu) akasitufu
Era ndayidde ennyanja ezijjudde amazzi
Ddala ebibonerezo bya Mukama omulabirizi wo bya kutuukirira
Tewali kigenda kubiremesa
Ku lunaku eggulu lwe liri yuguuma oluyuguuma
Ensozi nezitambula butambuzi
N’olwekyo okubonabona ku lunaku olwo kuliba ku balimbisa
Abo bo ababeera mu byolusaago nga bazannya
Ku lunaku lwe bali sindikirizibwa olusindikirizibwa, okuyingira omuliro Jahannama
Baligambibwa nti guno gwe muliro ogwo gwe mwali mulimbisa
